mapper.insert: insert into flm_work_group_close (id, logic_date, sys_clinic_id, flm_work_group_id, operator_id, begin_date, end_date, cash, unionpay, wechatpay, alipay, cmedicare, pmedicare, member_balance, creditpay, coupon, other_amount, actual_amount, last_updater_id, last_update_date, close_state ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logicDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flmWorkGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unionpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wechatpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alipay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cmedicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pmedicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeState,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: update flm_work_group_close set logic_date = #{logicDate,jdbcType=DATE}, sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flm_work_group_id = #{flmWorkGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cash = #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unionpay = #{unionpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wechatpay = #{wechatpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cmedicare = #{cmedicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pmedicare = #{pmedicare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, member_balance = #{memberBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, creditpay = #{creditpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon = #{coupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, other_amount = #{otherAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_updater_id = #{lastUpdaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, close_state = #{closeState,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, logic_date, sys_clinic_id, flm_work_group_id, operator_id, begin_date, end_date, cash, unionpay, wechatpay, alipay, cmedicare, pmedicare, member_balance, creditpay, coupon, other_amount, actual_amount, last_updater_id, last_update_date, close_state from flm_work_group_close where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, logic_date, sys_clinic_id, flm_work_group_id, operator_id, begin_date, end_date, cash, unionpay, wechatpay, alipay, cmedicare, pmedicare, member_balance, creditpay, coupon, other_amount, actual_amount, last_updater_id, last_update_date, close_state from flm_work_group_close
select * from flm_work_group_close where (DATE_FORMAT(logic_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{logicDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) and (operator_id = #{operatorId})
select * from flm_work_group_close where (DATE_FORMAT(logic_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{logicDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) and (sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId}) and (close_state is false)

select * from view_flm_work_group_close
(DATE_FORMAT(logicDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{logicDate[0]} and #{logicDate[1]}) and
(operatorId = #{operatorId}) and
(closeState = #{closeState}) and
(sysClinicName like '${sysClinicName}%' or sysClinicCode like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(operatorName like '${operatorName}%' or operatorCode like '${operatorName}%') and
order by id desc
